info.title: Nova & Zephyr
info.blurb: A comprehensive drone control system with Python-based ground software, wireless ESP32 communication, PID motor control, and a custom PCB integrating microcontrollers, sensors, and brushless motors.
info.description: Designed and developed a drone control system featuring Python-based ground software, wireless ESP32 communication, PID-stabilized motor control, and a custom PCB integrating microcontrollers, sensors, and brushless motors for reliable system-level testing.
